title: New: Cloud Castle Lake – Sync
body:
One of the most ambitious, ‘complete’ tracks I’ve heard in recent times, exploding onto the scene with a **Sigur Rós**\-esque grandeur and an immaculate vocal, **Cloud Castle Lake’s** _Sync_ is a mightily impressive debut.

Released through new label, Happy Valley Records, it’s lifted from their [debut EP](http://happyvalleyrecords.bigcartel.com/), titled Dandelion out mid-September. Check out Sync below.

Released through new label, Happy Valley Records, it’s lifted from their debut EP, titled Dandelion out mid-September. Check out Sync below.
